meta.description: Super Wings Game Assets - Shared Settings for Image Generation

negative_prompts.base: human, person, people, boy, girl, man, woman, child, humanoid, human face, human body, realistic human
negative_prompts.multi_character: multiple characters, two characters, three characters, group, crowd, duo, other characters
negative_prompts.quality: blurry, low quality, worst quality, bad quality, lowres, distorted, deformed, disfigured, mutated, malformed, ugly, amateur, draft, unfinished
negative_prompts.anatomy: extra eyes, three eyes, four eyes, multiple eyes, extra limbs, extra arms, extra legs, bad anatomy, bad proportions
negative_prompts.style_exclusion: 2d, anime style, cartoon illustration, painting, drawing, photographic, photo, photograph, real life
negative_prompts.artifacts: jpeg artifacts, watermark, text, signature, cropped, cut off, frame, border, noise, grainy, chromatic aberration
negative_prompts.sheet: multiple views, character sheet, reference sheet, turnaround
negative_prompts.color_error: wrong colors, incorrect colors, color swap, mismatched colors

negative_prompt_combined: human, person, people, boy, girl, man, woman, child, humanoid, human face, multiple characters, two characters, group, extra eyes, three eyes, multiple eyes, extra limbs, wrong colors, incorrect colors, blurry, low quality, worst quality, distorted, deformed, ugly, 2d, anime style, photographic, cropped, watermark, text, multiple views, character sheet

style_keywords.base: 3d animated character, toy-like CGI, glossy enamel finish, hard-surface render, Super Wings style
style_keywords.lighting: high-key daylight, soft shadows, bright reflections, clean lighting
style_keywords.quality: high quality 3d render, professional quality, clean anti-aliased edges, Pixar quality

jett.name: Jett
jett.features: small red jet plane with white accents, four yellow signal lights on cheeks and wings, blue eyes, stylized wing symbol on sides
jett.unique: four yellow signal lights (two on cheeks, two on wing edges), sporty jet silhouette
jett.style: enthusiastic, friendly, helpful expression, confident hero pose

jerome.name: Jerome
jerome.colors: blue with yellow lightning bolt decorations
jerome.color_detail: sleek blue body with yellow lightning decals
jerome.features: sleek blue war jet plane, yellow lightning bolt decals on wings and ailerons, green eyes, pointed nose, confident show plane posture
jerome.unique: yellow lightning bolts on wings, fighter jet aesthetic, slimmer agile silhouette
jerome.style: confident, stylish, experienced expression, performance-oriented poses

donnie.name: Donnie
donnie.color_detail: big yellow hull with blue propellers and accents
donnie.features: bulky yellow Canadair-style cargo plane, blue propellers and engine areas, amber eyes, rounded work plane body, small wings
donnie.unique: propeller plane, bulky Canadair body shape, construction/tool theme, stockier build
donnie.style: practical, inventive, friendly expression, sturdy mechanic poses

chase.name: Chase
chase.color_detail: dark blue body with three red thunder-shaped stripes
chase.features: dark blue spy jet plane, three red thunder-shaped stripes on body, blue eyes, sleek angular spy plane design
chase.unique: THREE distinctive red lightning stripes (must be exactly 3), spy theme, versatile transformation
chase.style: mysterious, clever, cool expression, resourceful poses

flip.name: Flip
flip.colors: red with white stripes, BLUE CAP WITH YELLOW TRIM
flip.color_detail: red sporty plane body with white stripes, wearing blue sports cap with yellow trim
flip.features: red sporty plane with white stripes, BLUE SPORTS CAP WITH YELLOW TRIM AND SYMBOL, blue eyes, compact athletic design
flip.unique: BLUE CAP WITH YELLOW TRIM - THIS IS THE KEY DISTINGUISHING FEATURE FROM JETT, sports theme, athletic proportions
flip.style: energetic, competitive, sporty expression, challenge-oriented poses
flip.critical_warning: MUST include blue cap with yellow trim to distinguish from Jett. Both are red - the cap is essential!

todd.name: Todd
todd.color_detail: brown body with yellow drill nose and yellow hard hat
todd.features: brown construction plane, yellow drill on nose, yellow hard hat on top, tank-like treads, smaller green eyes (mole-like)
todd.unique: yellow drill nose, yellow hard hat always visible, tank treads, underground/digging specialist
todd.style: determined, hard-working, straightforward expression, sturdy poses

paul.name: Paul
paul.color_detail: blue and white police colors with police markings
paul.features: blue and white police plane, siren on head, two lights on fore, yellow sheriff stars on forearms, blue eyes, police vehicle markings
paul.unique: police markings, siren on head, yellow sheriff stars on arms, law enforcement theme
paul.style: dutiful, responsible, fun-loving expression, authoritative poses

bello.name: Bello
bello.color_detail: black and white striped pattern like a zebra
bello.features: black and white striped safari plane with zebra pattern, propeller design, blue eyes, animal-themed decorations
bello.unique: distinctive zebra-like black and white stripes, animal communication ability, safari theme
bello.style: friendly, gentle, empathetic expression, approachable poses
